name: SUMMER SCREEN PRINTING SCHOOL 2014
description:
Come along and spend four action packed days of screen printing with Harvest Textiles.  We will take you through the steps of creating multi-colour placement prints and repeat patterns. You will learn how to draw motifs, make hand drawn repeat patterns and create registered placement prints. 
You will be printing your patterns onto lengths of fabric and tea towels, while learning about screenprinting, stencil cutting and how different types of ink can dramatically change your designs.

No experience necessary, price includes all printing materials and inks plus four tea towels and all fabric used throughout the course.  

This workshop is small and intimate with a maximum of 10 students. 

4 x sessions
14, 15, 16 & 17 January, 2014    9.30am - 3pm

The workshop will be held at Harvest Workroom, a professional screenprinting studio at 512 Lygon Street, East Brunswick, Melbourne, Australia 3057. 
For more information please contact us at info@harvestworkroom.com.au 
Please be sure to read the booking terms provided on the right side bar as workshops are non-refundable.

name: SCREEN PRINTING SUPER SCHOOL
description:
Spend four action packed days of screen printing with Harvest Textiles in their glorious print room. This time will give you the opportunity to create multi-colour placement prints, make hand drawn repeat patterns, create registered placement prints and expose your own artwork onto screen.
You will be printing your patterns onto lengths of fabric and tea towels, while learning about screenprinting, stencil cutting, photo exposure and how different types of ink can dramatically change your designs.

No experience necessary, price includes all printing materials and inks plus four tea towels and all fabric used throughout the course. 

4 x sessions 

February   4 , 5 , 6 & 7 2014 10am - 3pm
or
April 8, 9, 10, 11, 2014 10 am - 3pm. 

For more information please contact us at info@harvestworkroom.com.au 
Please be sure to read the booking terms provided on the right side bar as workshops are non-refundable.

name: DESIGN AND SCREEN PRINT YOUR OWN FABRIC
description:
Have you ever wanted to print your own fabric designs? Come and imagine that you are a textile designer for a weekend printing on the wonderful 10 metre table at the Harvest Workroom.
In this two day workshop you will learn how to draw motifs and make a hand drawn repeat pattern. 
You will then be printing your patterns onto lengths of fabric, while learning about screen printing, stencil cutting and how different types of inks can dramatically change your designs. 
 
No experience necessary, all materials provided. 

For more information please contact us at info@harvestworkroom.com.au
Please be sure to read the booking terms provided on the right side bar as workshops are non-refundable.

name: SHIBORI SILK SCARF HAND DYEING WITH HARVEST TEXTILES
description:
Join Harvest Textiles in our professional studio for this experimental workshop exploring various hand dyeing techniques to create pattern on silk scarves using the shibori method.
Students will be shown a variety of different resist processes such as pole wrapping, clamping, stitching & folding, pleating and binding pieces of cloth to create exciting and unique samples. 
A chosen technique will then be developed into two final indigo hand dyed silk scarves to take home with you.

All materials provided. Students are welcome to bring along their own garments or cloth to experiment with. No experience necessary.

For more information contact us at info@harvesttextiles.com.au 

• Please note that if you are unable to attend a class we are happy for you to send a friend in your place, but refunds are not available due to the small size of the classes. 
• Harvest Textiles reserves the right to cancel any workshop if the enrolment quota isn't met. In the case of your workshop being cancelled you will receive a full refund or you can choose to have the funds carried over to another workshop of the same value.

Please be sure to read the complete booking terms provided on the right side bar.

name: LEARN TO SCREEN PRINT IN A DAY
description:
Would you love to learn to screen print your own fabric but don't have time to do a long course?
Come and do our day long introduction class and learn all the basics of screen printing in an amazing textiles studio. 
Head home with a bag of your own hand printed goodies. 
Come and imagine that you are a textile designer for a day printing on the wonderful 10 metre table at the Harvest Workroom.
No experience necessary, all materials provided including basic cottons and water based ink for printing.


For more information please contact us at  info@harvestworkroom.com.au
Please be sure to read the booking terms provided on the right side bar.

name: PRINT YOUR OWN TEA TOWELS AT THE HARVEST WORKROOM
description:
A great way to indulge your own printing fetish and head home with some practical hand printed items under your arm.
Attend our tea towel printing class and learn the basics of screen printing in our friendly studio. 
Come and make some beautiful hand printed gifts that will be cherished by anyone who receives them.

(Price includes 4 x cotton tea towels for printing. More tea towels will be available on the day at wholesale prices.)


This class is small and intimate with a maximum of 10 people in this class.
No experience necessary, price includes all printing materials and inks plus the tea towels used.

For more information please contact us at info@harvestworkroom.com.au
Please be sure to read the booking terms provided on the right side bar as workshops are non-refundable.

name: PRINT YOUR OWN GEOMETRIC TEA TOWELS
description:
Print your own collection of Geometric tea towels to give as Christmas presents- they will be so good you will want to keep them! 
In this class we have taken all the hard work out of designing. Using pre made Harvest designs you can relax on the print table while you learn to print.
On the day you will print at least 10 tea towels with the option to buy more if you chose. 
This year give someone you love a handmade present that they will love! 

(Price includes 10 x cotton tea towels for printing. More tea towels will be available on the day at wholesale prices.)

No experience necessary, price includes all printing materials and inks plus the tea towels used.
  
One session 
Saturday December 14th ,  2013 10am- 3pm
Sunday December 15th , 2013 10am- 3pm

For more information please contact us at info@harvestworkroom.com.au
Please be sure to read the booking terms provided on the right side bar as workshops are non-refundable.

name: PATTERN PLAY
description:
This workshop is all about PATTERN! You will spend a day exploring a range of patterns and using colour and movement to create unique screen printed designs.  You will learn how to print using Harvest made patterns, learn about how the different types of inks behave and how to prepare fabric for printing.
In the workshop you will create a “sampler” piece of colour and pattern that can be turned into a cotton scarf.  You will then move onto printing a set of pillow cases with adventurous colours and shapes, knowing you will sleep well on these little beauties!

No experience needed, all materials provided. 

This workshop will be held at the Harvest Workroom, 512 Lygon Street, Brunswick East, Melbourne, Australia.
  
One session
 
November Saturday the 2nd  2013     11am - 3pm
December Sunday the 1st  2013     11am - 3pm
January Saturday the 18th, 2014 10am-3pm.

For more information please contact us at info@harvestworkroom.com.au
Please be sure to read the booking terms provided on the right side bar as workshops are non-refundable.

name: EZY CUT STENCIL SHEETS
description:
Ezy Cut is a great way to generate stencil artworks that can then be used on an open meshed screen for printing. 
As its name suggests Ezy Cut is very easy to cut with a craft knife as it is strong and durable. 
Made from 100% polypropylene Ezy Cut is water resistant, non absorbent and can be washed and dried ready for use again. 
When well looked after it resists tearing and buckling giving your stencils a long life in your studio environment. 

Sold in packs of 30 sheets. Each sheet is 40cm x 55cm.

options.name: 30 sheets of ezy cut stencil plastic
